name: YOU VS CANNIBAL CLOWNS
description:
YOU VS CANNIBAL CLOWNS is a survival horror game.

The game was made in 24 days.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

F - Flashlight

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Shoot

R - Reload

E - Doors

ADVICE:

You must find three keys for three special doors.

STORY:

Welcome to nightmare!

Find keys, find doors, shoot and run, because you're MEAT for 13 cannibal clowns!

Can you survive? Can you wake up? NO!!! HA HA HA HA!

Built in Easy FPS Editor
